snippet.title: Kiva co-founder Matt Flannery on finding your startup idea and getting people to come with you
snippet.description: TechRepublic profiles Matt Flannery, co-founder of Kiva, about the impact of microfinancing and the inspiration of working with entrepreneurs around the world every day.

snippet.title: The mainframe evolves into a new beast in the cloud era
snippet.description: Cloud computing didn't kill the mainframe. The disruptive technology did, however, cause the mainframe to evolve.

snippet.title: Five Apps for Active Directory management
snippet.description: Keep your enterprise, whether big or small, running an efficient Active Directory environment.

snippet.title: Enterprise application orchestration with ASCI's ActiveBatch
snippet.description: John Joyner reports on a demo of an enterprise application orchestration tool for industrial strength enterprise job scheduling and workflow automation.

snippet.title: Five free network analyzers worth any IT admin's time
snippet.description: Solid information leads to a strong and worry-free network. Jack Wallen lists five tools that can get you that solid information for free.

snippet.title: Will the Internet of Things be the end of cloud computing?
snippet.description: Nick Hardiman peers into the future of the Internet of Things. What changes will this evolving model bring?

snippet.title: Become a Java programmer without a college degree
snippet.description: Being a pro on Java doesn't necessarily mean you need a college degree. You just have to take the right steps.
